presentationColumns.name: Balance Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the balance of the specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Balance Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Activity Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the activity amount of the specified accounts. Where Activity Amount = Sum of Debit Amount - Sum of Credit Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Activity Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Opening Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the opening balance of the specified accounts. This metric is computed as follows : Balance Amount - Activity Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Opening Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Closing Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the closing balance of the specified accounts. The closing amount will show zero if the balance amount is null, this is the only difference between the balance amount and closing amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Closing Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of debit entries amount for the specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Debit Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of credit entries amount for specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Credit Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Absolute Balance Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the absolute balance amount of the specified accounts.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Absolute Balance Amount in Analytics Currency

presentationColumns.name: Absolute Activity Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the absolute activity amount of the specified accounts. Activity Amount = Sum of Debit Amount - Sum of Credit Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Absolute Activity Amount in Analytics Currency
